entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
